nodes.bodyText:
I would make it simple:
✔ ~/java/github/checkstyle/checkstyle [master|✔] 
$ ls -la target/
total 32
drwxrwxr-x  8 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:59 .
drwxrwxr-x 13 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:57 ..
-rw-rw-r--  1 rivanov rivanov    0 Mar 13 06:59 actual.txt
drwxrwxr-x  3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:57 classes
drwxrwxr-x  4 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:57 generated-sources
drwxrwxr-x  3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:57 generated-test-sources
-rw-rw-r--  1 rivanov rivanov    0 Mar 13 06:59 ignored.txt
drwxrwxr-x  4 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:57 maven-status
drwxrwxr-x  3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:58 pit-reports
drwxrwxr-x  4 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:57 test-classes
✔ ~/java/github/checkstyle/checkstyle [master|✔] 
 $ ls -la target/pit-reports/
total 12
drwxrwxr-x 3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:58 .
drwxrwxr-x 8 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:59 ..
drwxrwxr-x 3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:59 202003130658
✔ ~/java/github/checkstyle/checkstyle [master|✔] 
$ ls -la target/pit-reports/202003130658/
total 24
drwxrwxr-x 3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:59 .
drwxrwxr-x 3 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:58 ..
drwxrwxr-x 2 rivanov rivanov 4096 Mar 13 06:59 com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks
-rw-rw-r-- 1 rivanov rivanov 1634 Mar 13 06:59 index.html
-rw-rw-r-- 1 rivanov rivanov 5514 Mar 13 06:59 style.css

just let circleci to copy whole target/pit-reports/ folder, there will be always one report.
such artifacts are for maintainers, they know this structure, and will have no problems.
New contributors will never find artifacts, and they will test in on their local, contributors do not need this report that much.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -67,9 +67,13 @@ jobs:
               CMD="$(circleci tests split commands.txt)"
               echo "Command: $CMD"
               eval $CMD
+              mkdir pitest-report && mv ./target/pit-reports/*/* pitest-report
+              ls -R | grep ":$" | sed -e 's/:$//' -e 's/[^-][^\/]*\//--/g' -e 's/^/   /' -e 's/-/|/'
             else
               echo "build is skipped ..."
             fi
+      - store_artifacts:
+          path: ./pitest-report

nodes.bodyText:
or at least keep all files under target folder, to keep repo sources clean (it is very good practice, we try to fix all CIs to not put anything to repo to have git status clean after any executions).
mv ./target/pit-reports/*/* target/pit-reports

             else
               echo "build is skipped ..."
             fi
+      - store_artifacts:
+          path: ./pitest-report
